text: Gale Ann Norton (born March 11, 1954) is an American politician and lawyer. She was the 48th United States Secretary of the Interior from 2001 to 2006 under President George W. Bush. She was the first woman to hold the position. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of the Interior Category:Lawyers from Wichita, Kansas Category:Businesspeople from Colorado Category:Businesspeople from Wichita, Kansas Category:Politicians from Colorado Category:Politicians from Wichita, Kansas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Colorado
title: Gale Norton
